feed.title: Burrows Report
feed.subtitle: Facts for people on the go and in the know

entry.title: Chicago White Sox make unwanted history by recording the most losses in a single modern MLB season

link.title: Chicago White Sox make unwanted history by recording the most losses in a single modern MLB season

entry.content: By losing to the Detroit Tigers 41 Friday the 2024 White Sox entered the record books as one of the most inept teams in sports history
entry.summary: By losing to the Detroit Tigers 41 Friday the 2024 White Sox entered the record books as one of the most inept teams in sports history

entry.title: Maggie Smith beloved Downton Abbey and Harry Potter star dead at 89

link.title: Maggie Smith beloved Downton Abbey and Harry Potter star dead at 89

entry.content: Maggie Smith one of Britains bestknown actresses whose long career ranged from starring opposite Laurence Olivier in Othello on stage and screen to roles in Harry Potter and Downton Abbey has died
entry.summary: Maggie Smith one of Britains bestknown actresses whose long career ranged from starring opposite Laurence Olivier in Othello on stage and screen to roles in Harry Potter and Downton Abbey has died

entry.title: Nearly 1 in 3 US adults may have an iron deficiency study suggests

link.title: Nearly 1 in 3 US adults may have an iron deficiency study suggests

entry.content: A large proportion of adults in the United States nearly 1 in 3 may have one of two forms of iron deficiency even if they dont have a health condition for which they would be screened for the condition such as anemia heart failure or chronic kidney disease a new study suggests
entry.summary: A large proportion of adults in the United States nearly 1 in 3 may have one of two forms of iron deficiency even if they dont have a health condition for which they would be screened for the condition such as anemia heart failure or chronic kidney disease a new study suggests

entry.title: NTSB issues urgent safety warning for some Boeing 737s including MAX in latest blow to struggling planemaker

link.title: NTSB issues urgent safety warning for some Boeing 737s including MAX in latest blow to struggling planemaker

entry.content: The National Transportation Safety Board is issuing urgent safety recommendations for some Boeing 737sincluding the embattled 737 MAX line warning that critical flight controls could jam
entry.summary: The National Transportation Safety Board is issuing urgent safety recommendations for some Boeing 737sincluding the embattled 737 MAX line warning that critical flight controls could jam

entry.title: Putin revises his nuclear doctrine but have his red lines shifted

link.title: Putin revises his nuclear doctrine but have his red lines shifted

entry.content: Russian President Vladimir Putin is fond of nuclear saberrattling On the eve of Russias fullscale invasion of Ukraine in February 2022 the Kremlin leader presided over the rehearsal of a nuclear strike and his notsoveiled nuclear threatshave since kept US officials on edge
entry.summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin is fond of nuclear saberrattling On the eve of Russias fullscale invasion of Ukraine in February 2022 the Kremlin leader presided over the rehearsal of a nuclear strike and his notsoveiled nuclear threatshave since kept US officials on edge

entry.title: Sean Diddy Combs accused of drugging and sexually assaulting a woman in new civil lawsuit

link.title: Sean Diddy Combs accused of drugging and sexually assaulting a woman in new civil lawsuit

entry.content: Sean Diddy Combs has been accused of drugging and sexually assaulting a woman in another civil lawsuit marking at least the 11th misconduct lawsuit hes faced in as many months
entry.summary: Sean Diddy Combs has been accused of drugging and sexually assaulting a woman in another civil lawsuit marking at least the 11th misconduct lawsuit hes faced in as many months

entry.title: They hit it off on vacation but then he went silent So she decided to pick up the phone

link.title: They hit it off on vacation but then he went silent So she decided to pick up the phone

entry.content: When Nana Prempeh didnt hear from her vacation romance Edouard she decided to phone him out of the blueHereshow Edouard reacted
entry.summary: When Nana Prempeh didnt hear from her vacation romance Edouard she decided to phone him out of the blueHereshow Edouard reacted

entry.title: UK court hands prison terms to climate activists who threw soup on Van Goghs Sunflowers

link.title: UK court hands prison terms to climate activists who threw soup on Van Goghs Sunflowers

entry.content: Their sentences are the latest in a string of similar punishments handed to climate activists for engaging in disruptive protests against the use of fossil fuels
entry.summary: Their sentences are the latest in a string of similar punishments handed to climate activists for engaging in disruptive protests against the use of fossil fuels

entry.title: Bannon on Refusing Lunch with Palestinian President I Didnt Want to Breathe the Same Air as a Terrorist

link.title: Bannon on Refusing Lunch with Palestinian President I Didnt Want to Breathe the Same Air as a Terrorist

entry.content: Breitbart News Executive Chairman Stephen K Bannon discussed his address to the Zionist Organization of America on Mondays Breitbart News Daily with SiriusXM host Alex Marlow
entry.summary: Breitbart News Executive Chairman Stephen K Bannon discussed his address to the Zionist Organization of America on Mondays Breitbart News Daily with SiriusXM host Alex Marlow

entry.title: Bannon Republican Establishment and Media Launched a Weaponized Hit on Judge Moore

link.title: Bannon Republican Establishment and Media Launched a Weaponized Hit on Judge Moore

entry.content: Breitbart News Executive Chairman Stephen K Bannon discussed the allegations of molesting an underage girl leveled against Alabama Senate candidate Roy Moore on Mondays Breitbart News Daily Bannon agreed with SiriusXM host Alex Marlow that Moore is the target of a coordinated hit by Democrats the media and Establishment Republicans
entry.summary: Breitbart News Executive Chairman Stephen K Bannon discussed the allegations of molesting an underage girl leveled against Alabama Senate candidate Roy Moore on Mondays Breitbart News Daily Bannon agreed with SiriusXM host Alex Marlow that Moore is the target of a coordinated hit by Democrats the media and Establishment Republicans
